text.div:
SNOMED CT Codes

Codes identifying atomic results of observations when value is type codeableConcept. This value set includes all the children of SNOMED CT Concepts from SCTIDs 404684003 Clinical finding (finding), 410607006 Organism (organism),362981000 Qualifier value (qualifier value), 105590001 Substance (substance), and 123037004 Body structure (body structure). It is provided as a suggestive example

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 404684003
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 410607006
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 362981000
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 105590001
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 123037004

name: SNOMED CT Codes
publisher: HL7 International - Orders and Observations WG

fhir_comments: ObservationValue	 Example SNOMED CT for coded results which includes Organism names, Findings, and Qualifier, Substance, and  Body Structure hierarchies.  This should cover >90% of observation results .
